message.content:
{"id": "14113", 
"title": "Should listen to FSOURCEATTACHED and FSOURCEDETACHED java deltas", 
"description": "When changing the attached source of a jar, a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH java delta is fired, which is incorrect. As a result, the UI closes the class file editors opened on this jar, which is expected for a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH java delta. However, when I tried to fix the delta to be a (FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED) delta, the UI did not react.", 
"OB": "Currently, when the attached source of a jar is changed, a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH java delta is fired instead of FSOURCEATTACHED or FSOURCEDETACHED java deltas.", 
"EB": "The UI should react by closing the class file editors opened on the jar when a FSOURCEDETACHED or FSOURCEATTACHED java delta occurs after changing the attached source of a jar.", 
"SR": "Modify the delta to be a (FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED) delta so that the UI reacts accordingly by closing the class file editors opened on the jar when the attached source is changed."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '14113', 'title': 'Bug 14113Should listen to FSOURCEATTACHED and FSOURCEDETACHED java deltas', 'description': 'Bug 14113Should listen to FSOURCEATTACHED and FSOURCEDETACHED java deltas ', 'OB': 'Build 20020416Right now, when one change the attached source of a jar, aFREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH java delta is fired, which is obviously wrong.As a consequence, the UI reacts by closing the class file editors opened onthis jar, which is right for a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH java delta.However I tried to fix the delta to be a (FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED)delta, but the UI would not react. ', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'Build 20020416Right now, when one change the attached source of a jar, aFREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH java delta is fired, which is obviously wrong.As a consequence, the UI reacts by closing the class file editors opened onthis jar, which is right for a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH java delta.However I tried to fix the delta to be a (FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED)delta, but the UI would not react. '}
